sourcesContent:
"use client"
import { Navbar as BootstrapNavbar, Nav, Container, Button, NavDropdown } from "react-bootstrap"
import { LinkContainer } from "react-router-bootstrap"
import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext"

const Navbar = () => {
  const { user, logout } = useAuth()

  const handleLogout = () => {
    logout()
    window.location.href = "/"
  }

  return (
    <BootstrapNavbar bg="dark" variant="dark" expand="lg" className="shadow-sm" style={{ width: '100%' }}>
      <Container fluid>
        <LinkContainer to="/">
          <BootstrapNavbar.Brand className="navbar-brand">
            ðŸ“š
            EduSync
          </BootstrapNavbar.Brand>
        </LinkContainer>

        <BootstrapNavbar.Toggle aria-controls="basic-navbar-nav" />
        <BootstrapNavbar.Collapse id="basic-navbar-nav">
          <Nav className="me-auto">
            <LinkContainer to="/">
              <Nav.Link>Home</Nav.Link>
            </LinkContainer>
            <LinkContainer to="/courses">
              <Nav.Link>Courses</Nav.Link>
            </LinkContainer>
            <LinkContainer to="/about">
              <Nav.Link>About</Nav.Link>
            </LinkContainer>
          </Nav>

          <Nav>
            {user ? (
              <NavDropdown title={`Welcome, ${user.username || user.name || 'User'}`} id="user-dropdown">
                <LinkContainer to={user.role === "Instructor" ? "/instructor-dashboard" : "/student-dashboard"}>
                  <NavDropdown.Item>Dashboard</NavDropdown.Item>
                </LinkContainer>
                <NavDropdown.Item>Profile</NavDropdown.Item>
                <NavDropdown.Divider />
                <NavDropdown.Item onClick={handleLogout}>Logout</NavDropdown.Item>
              </NavDropdown>
            ) : (
              <>
                <LinkContainer to="/login">
                  <Nav.Link>
                    <Button variant="outline-light" size="sm">
                      Login
                    </Button>
                  </Nav.Link>
                </LinkContainer>
                <LinkContainer to="/register">
                  <Nav.Link>
                    <Button variant="light" size="sm" className="ms-2">
                      Register
                    </Button>
                  </Nav.Link>
                </LinkContainer>
              </>
            )}
          </Nav>
        </BootstrapNavbar.Collapse>
      </Container>
    </BootstrapNavbar>
  )
}

export default Navbar
